definitions.title: n. [m.]
definitions.body: way, path (prop.as flowing along, stretching out ? cf. NH [[שְׁבִיל]], Ar sabiylun); Aram. [[שְׁבִילָא]]);—pl. sf. [[רַבִּים וּשְׁבִילְיךָ֠ בְּמַיִם]] [Kt [[שְׁבִילְךָ]] Ps 77:20 (of ´[[י]]:; ‖[[דַּרְכֶָּךָ ]]); cstr. (fig. of course of life) [[שְׁבוּלֵי עוֹלָם]] Je 18:15 (Kt; Qr [[שְׁבִילֵי]]; ‖[[דְּרָכִים ]]).
